mapper.insert: insert into gameboard values(#{host}, #{place}, #{content}, SEQ_GAMEBOARD.nextval, #{phone}, #{email} , #{gametitle}, TO_DATE(#{startday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{team_id}, sysdate)
mapper.select: rownum<=10 select * from team where rownum <= 10 and team_id = (select team_id from gameboard where endday = TO_DATE(#{endday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))

select * from (select rownum as rno , host, place, gameno, gametitle, startday , team_logo_file_name,team_id from (select * from gameboard, team where gameboard.g_team_id = team.team_id and gameboard.endday < sysdate order by gameboard.endday desc))where rno = 1

select * from (select rownum as rno , host, place, gameno, gametitle, startday , team_logo_file_name,team_id from (select * from gameboard, team where rownum <= 10 and gameboard.g_team_id = team.team_id and gameboard.endday < sysdate order by gameboard.endday desc))where rno > 1
